com.foreach.across.modules.taxonomy.domain.term

Interface TermWebCmsAssetService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TermWebCmsAssetServiceImpl

    public interface TermWebCmsAssetService
    Provides functionality to find WebCmsAssets that are linked to Term entities or the other way around. Flags determine whether to include the descendants of a Term or not.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Andy Somers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TERM_TO_ASSET 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.asset.WebCmsAsset> findAllByTerm(Term term, boolean includeDescendants)
      Finds all WebCmsAssets linked to one Term, optionally including assets linked to its descendants
      Set<Term> findAllByWebCmsAsset(com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.asset.WebCmsAsset asset)
      Finds all Terms linked to a WebCmsAsset

    • Field Detail

      • TERM_TO_ASSET

        static final String TERM_TO_ASSET
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • findAllByTerm

        Set<com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.asset.WebCmsAsset> findAllByTerm(Term term,
                                                                              boolean includeDescendants)
        Finds all WebCmsAssets linked to one Term, optionally including assets linked to its descendants
        Parameters:
        term - the Term to which the WebCmsAssets are linked
        includeDescendants - whether to check the descendants of the Term for linked WebCmsAssets
        Returns:
        Set of WebCmsAsset

      • findAllByWebCmsAsset

        Set<Term> findAllByWebCmsAsset(com.foreach.across.modules.webcms.domain.asset.WebCmsAsset asset)
        Finds all Terms linked to a WebCmsAsset
        Parameters:
        asset - the WebCmsAsset to which the Terms are linked
        Returns:
        Set of Terms
